page.title: 12The Food We Eat
page.content:
{THREE,3rd YEAR JUNIOR GIRLS,REPORT:}
The food we eat mostly in the morning is cereal which was made popular in USA. Some people have cooked breakfast like egg and bacon or beans on toast.
{ Some people get fish and chips from {the chip shop or something like curry {and rice. That is called fast food.
You can also buy food which is ready to just pop into the oven or under the grill. This is often frozen food. If you eat too much fast food it is not good for you.
{ Women used to bake a lot but now some {can't because they work and don't have {enough time. However some women still {bake and they make things like loaves {pies and cakes.
